init_eqs_str: a['basstime'] = 0; a['stickybit'] = 0; a['volavg2'] = 0; a['q1'] = 0; a['sum'] = 0; a['diff'] = 0; a['edge'] = 0; a['rule3'] = 0; a['rule2'] = 0; a['volavg'] = 0; a['bit2'] = 0; a['rule4'] = 0; a['vol'] = 0; a['rule1'] = 0; a['q2'] = 0; a['basssum'] = 0;
frame_eqs_str: a['basstime']=(a['basstime']+(a['bass_att']*0.03)); a['vol']=pow(((a['bass']+a['mid'])+a['treb']), 2); a['basssum']=a['vol']; a['stickybit']=mod(a['time'],2); a['volavg']=(a['volavg']+(a['vol']*equal(a['stickybit'], 1))); a['volavg2']=(a['volavg2']+(a['vol']*equal(a['stickybit'], 0))); a['edge']=bnot(equal(a['bit2'], a['stickybit'])); a['volavg']=(a['volavg']-((a['volavg']*a['edge'])*a['stickybit'])); a['volavg2']=(a['volavg2']-((a['volavg2']*a['edge'])*equal(a['stickybit'], 0))); a['diff']=((Math.abs(equal(a['stickybit'], 1))>0.00001)?(div(a['basssum'],a['volavg2'])):(0)); a['diff']=((Math.abs(equal(a['stickybit'], 0))>0.00001)?(div(a['basssum'],a['volavg'])):(a['diff'])); a['bit2']=mod(a['time'],2); a['q1']=(a['diff']*2); a['ob_r']=(0.5+(0.5*Math.sin((a['basstime']*4.5)))); a['ob_g']=(0.5+(0.5*Math.sin((a['basstime']*5)))); a['ob_b']=(0.5+(0.5*Math.sin((a['basstime']*3.8)))); a['q2']=a['basstime'];
pixel_eqs_str: a['rule1']=((a['x']*a['x'])*Math.floor(randint(10))); a['rule2']=((a['y']*a['y'])*Math.floor(randint(10))); a['rule3']=((a['ang']*a['ang'])*Math.floor(randint(10))); a['rule4']=((a['rad']*a['rad'])*Math.floor(randint(10))); a['sum']=((((Math.cos(a['q2'])*a['rule1'])+(Math.cos((a['q2']+1.78))*a['rule3']))+(Math.cos((a['q2']+3.14))*a['rule2']))+(Math.cos((a['q2']+4.92))*a['rule4'])); a['sum']=a['sum']; a['rot']=((1*a['q1'])*a['sum']); a['sx']=(1-(a['q1']*0.6)); a['sy']=(1-(a['q1']*0.6)); a['cx']=(0.5+(0.3*Math.sin(a['time']))); a['zoom']=(1-(a['q1']*a['rad']));
